artefacts/codecs.title: Codecs
artefacts/codecs.description: Codecs are used to describe how to decode data from the wire and encode it back to wire format.

artefacts/offramps.title: Offramps
artefacts/offramps.description: Specify how tremor connects to the outside world in order to publish to external systems.

artefacts/onramps.title: Onramps
artefacts/onramps.description: Specify how Tremor connects to the outside world in order to receive from external systems.

artefacts/postprocessors.title: Postprocessors
artefacts/postprocessors.description: Postprocessors operate on the raw data stream and transform it. They are run after data reaches the codec and do not know or care about tremor's internal representation.

artefacts/preprocessors.title: Preprocessors
artefacts/preprocessors.description: Preprocessors operate on the raw data stream and transform it. They are run before data reaches the codec and do not know or care about tremor's internal representation.

ConstraintsLimitations.title: Constraints and Limitations
ConstraintsLimitations.description: This section lists known limitations in the current version of Tremor, these limitations are not oversights but tradeoffs driven by the use cases we focused on.

glossary.title: Glossary
glossary.description: A set of terms in common or standardised usage by the tremor project and/or team

history.title: History
history.description: Tremor started with a straightforward problem statement:

index.title: Tremor
index.description: Tremor is an event processing system originally designed for the needs of platform engineering and infrastructure.

operations/gdcb.description: With tremor 0.9 we introduced logic for Guaranteed Delivery (GD) and Circuit Breakers (CB) so it is

operations/linked-transports.title: Linked Transports
operations/linked-transports.description: Linked transports are in alpha status as of v0.9.0 and we recommend its use only for exploratory projects. Details around it (including any on this page) are likely to change, as the feature set matures.

operations/monitoring.title: Monitoring
operations/monitoring.description: Monitoring tremor is done using tremor itself. This has some interesting implications.

overview.title: Architecture Overview
overview.description: This is a short architectural overview of Tremor.

tremor-query/functions.title: Aggregate Functions
tremor-query/functions.description: Tremor Query provides access to a growing number of aggregate functions that allow advanced data manipulation over sets of events delineated by windowed operations.

tremor-query/functions/stats.title: The stats namespace
tremor-query/functions/stats.description: The stats module contains functions for aggregating statistical measures

tremor-query/functions/win.title: The win namespace
tremor-query/functions/win.description: The win module contains functions for aggregating over the current active window in a window of events. The functions can also be used in tilt frames where events emitting from a window are chained across multiple window frames in sequence.

tremor-query/index.title: Tremor-Query
tremor-query/index.description: The tremor query language, tremor-query or trickle is an interpreted statement-oriented language designed for continuous online structured queries with support for filtering, extraction, transformation and streaming of structured data in a stream or event-based processing system.

tremor-query/modules.title: Modules
tremor-query/modules.description: Tremor-query supports nested namespaces or modules.

tremor-query/operators.title: Operators
tremor-query/operators.description: Operators are part of the pipeline configuration.

tremor-query/recipes.title: Periodic Synthetic Metrics Events
tremor-query/recipes.description: Periodically, produce basic statistics and percentiles / quartiles from a stream of ingested events, for a particular value in the inbound event stream.

tremor-script/extractors.title: Extractors
tremor-script/extractors.description: The tremor-script language can recognize micro-formats and extract or elementize data from those micro-formats.

tremor-script/extractors/base64.title: Base64
tremor-script/extractors/base64.description: The base64 extractor decodes content encoded with the Base64 binary-to-text encoding scheme into the corresponding string value.

tremor-script/extractors/cidr.title: CIDR
tremor-script/extractors/cidr.description: Classless Inter-Domain Routing ( CIDR ) is a method of allocating IP addresses and IP routing paths. CIDR notation is a compact representation of an IP address and its associated routing prefix.

tremor-script/extractors/datetime.title: Datetime
tremor-script/extractors/datetime.description: The datetime extractor parses the input into a timestamp. The format of the target needs to be specified as a parameter to the extractor.

tremor-script/extractors/dissect.title: Dissect
tremor-script/extractors/dissect.description: The Dissect extractor is loosely based on logstash's dissect plugin. It extracts data from strings in form of key-value pairs based on the pattern specified. It supports patterns which makes it lightweight compared to other extractors such as grok or regex.

tremor-script/extractors/glob.title: Glob
tremor-script/extractors/glob.description: Glob is an extractor that checks if the input string matches the specified Unix shell-style pattern#Unix-like). The extractor fails if an pattern is specified that is not valid or the string doesn't match the pattern.

tremor-script/extractors/grok.title: Grok
tremor-script/extractors/grok.description: The grok extractor is useful for parsing unstructured data into a structured form. It is based on logstash's grok plugin. Grok uses regular expressions, so any regular expression can be used as a grok pattern.

tremor-script/extractors/influx.title: Influx
tremor-script/extractors/influx.description: Influx extrector matches data from the string that uses the Influx Line Protocol. It will fail if the input isn't a valid string.

tremor-script/extractors/json.title: JSON
tremor-script/extractors/json.description: The JSON extractor converts the input string into its respective JSON representation conforming to The Javascript Object Notation Data Interchange Format (RFC 8259)

tremor-script/extractors/kv.title: KV
tremor-script/extractors/kv.description: Parses a string into a map. It is possible to split based on different characters that represent  either field or key value boundaries.

tremor-script/extractors/regex.title: Regex (re)
tremor-script/extractors/regex.description: The regex extractor extracts fields from data by parsing a regular expression provided by the user. It accepts a "perl-style regular expression"

tremor-script/functions.title: Functions
tremor-script/functions.description: Tremor-script provides access to a growing number of functions that allow

tremor-script/index.title: Tremor-Script
tremor-script/index.description: The tremor-script scripting language is an interpreted expression-oriented language designed for the filtering, extraction, transformation and streaming of structured data in a stream or event-based processing system.

tremor-script/modules.title: Modules
tremor-script/modules.description: Tremor-script supports nested namespaces or modules.

tremor-script/recipes.title: Recipes
tremor-script/recipes.description: This document provides a few recipes for common patterns in tremor script. Please note however that it neither is exhaustive nor should those patterns considered the 'only way' to perform certain tasks.

tremor-script/stdlib/cncf.title: cncf
tremor-script/stdlib/cncf.description: It provides the following modules for cloud native computing:

tremor-script/stdlib/cncf/otel/logs/seve.title: severity
tremor-script/stdlib/cncf/otel/logs/seve.description: The severity module defines severity_number values

tremor-script/stdlib/cncf/otel/logs/trac.title: traceflags
tremor-script/stdlib/cncf/otel/logs/trac.description: The severity module defines severity_number values

tremor-script/stdlib/cncf/otel/metrics/t.title: temporality
tremor-script/stdlib/cncf/otel/metrics/t.description: This module is a mapping of the AggregationTemporality field in

tremor-script/stdlib/cncf/otel/trace/spa.title: spankind
tremor-script/stdlib/cncf/otel/trace/spa.description: SpanKind is the type of span. Can be used to specify additional relationships between spans

tremor-script/stdlib/cncf/otel/trace/sta.title: status
tremor-script/stdlib/cncf/otel/trace/sta.description: The Status type defines a logical error model that is suitable for different

tremor-script/stdlib/std.title: std
tremor-script/stdlib/std.description: The tremor language standard library it provides the following modules:

tremor-script/stdlib/std/array.title: array
tremor-script/stdlib/std/array.description: The array module contains functions to work for arrays.

tremor-script/stdlib/std/base64.title: base64
tremor-script/stdlib/std/base64.description: The base64 module contains functions to work with base64 encoding and decoding

tremor-script/stdlib/std/binary.title: binary
tremor-script/stdlib/std/binary.description: The binary module handles interacting with the binary/bytes type

tremor-script/stdlib/std/float.title: float
tremor-script/stdlib/std/float.description: The float module contains functions to work with floats.

tremor-script/stdlib/std/integer.title: integer
tremor-script/stdlib/std/integer.description: The integer module contains functions to work with integers.

tremor-script/stdlib/std/json.title: json
tremor-script/stdlib/std/json.description: The json module contains functions that work with son structures.

tremor-script/stdlib/std/math.title: math
tremor-script/stdlib/std/math.description: The math module contains functions for common mathematical operations.

tremor-script/stdlib/std/random.title: random
tremor-script/stdlib/std/random.description: The random module contains functions for generating random values of various

tremor-script/stdlib/std/range.title: range
tremor-script/stdlib/std/range.description: The range module contains functions for common range generator operations.

tremor-script/stdlib/std/re.title: re
tremor-script/stdlib/std/re.description: The re module contains functions for regular expression handing. Please note

tremor-script/stdlib/std/record.title: record
tremor-script/stdlib/std/record.description: The record module contains functions to work with records.

tremor-script/stdlib/std/string.title: string
tremor-script/stdlib/std/string.description: The string module contains functions that primarily work with strings.

tremor-script/stdlib/std/test.title: test
tremor-script/stdlib/std/test.description: The test module is used for writing tremor unit tests.

tremor-script/stdlib/std/type.title: type
tremor-script/stdlib/std/type.description: The type module contains functions that help inspecting types of values.

tremor-script/stdlib/std/url.title: url
tremor-script/stdlib/std/url.description: The url module contains functions to work on urls

tremor-script/stdlib/tremor.title: tremor
tremor-script/stdlib/tremor.description: Tremor runtime related libraries. This provides the following modules:

tremor-script/stdlib/tremor/chash.title: chash
tremor-script/stdlib/tremor/chash.description: The chash module contains functions for consistent hashing of values.

tremor-script/stdlib/tremor/origin.title: origin
tremor-script/stdlib/tremor/origin.description: The origin module contains functions for retrieving relevant origin

tremor-script/stdlib/tremor/system.title: system
tremor-script/stdlib/tremor/system.description: The system namespace contains functions that provide information about the
